mapper.insert: insert into board_table_project (boardTitle, boardWriter, boardContents, fileAttached) values (#{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardContents}, #{fileAttached})
mapper.select: select * from board_table_project b, board_file_table_project bf where b.id=bf.boardId and b.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update board_table_project set boardHits = boardHits + 1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from board_table_project order by id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
mapper.update: update board_table_project set boardTitle=#{boardTitle}, boardContents=#{boardContents} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from board_table_project where ${type} like concat('%', #{q}, '%') order by id desc
